name: Creepy Crawly Cannabis Butter Rice Krispie
ingredients: Optional: gummy worms or other creepy candy decorations
instructions: 1. In a large pot, melt the cannabutter over low heat until completely melted.
2. Add the mini marshmallows to the pot and stir constantly until they are fully melted and well combined with the cannabutter.
3. Remove the pot from heat and immediately add the Rice Krispies to the pot. Stir quickly and thoroughly until the Rice Krispies are coated evenly with the marshmallow mixture.
4. Optional: If using gummy worms or other creepy candy decorations, press them into the top of the Rice Krispie mixture while it is still warm.
5. Transfer the mixture into a greased or lined baking dish and press it down firmly to create an even layer.
6. Let the Rice Krispie treat cool and set at room temperature for at least 1 hour or until firm.
7. Once completely set, cut the treats into individual square pieces.
description: Creepy Crawly Cannabis Butter Rice Krispie treats are a fun and spooky twist on the classic treat. These delicious treats are made with cannabutter, giving them an extra kick. They are perfect for Halloween parties or any occasion that calls for some spooky, cannabis-infused goodness.
